Desc.entry: Offers 18 beds for people with learning disabilities, complex needs or physical disabilities aged 25 to over 80. Run by Guinness Northern Counties and staffed by Sheffield Health and Social Care. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.
